title: Motorola's New Flagship & a Hands-On Review of the OnePlus 8 & iPhone SE
description:
Now that we've had some quality time with the new OnePlus 8 and iPhone SE, we recorded a special bonus episode to tell you a little more about each phone and see if our first impressions were accurate. Then, we take a look at NVIDIA's new RTX Voice feature to see if it lives up to the hype, as well as Motorola's new flagship phone: the Motorola Edge Plus.
Stay informed, stay healthy, and stay safe out there, folks!
